## Profile

Prof. Nafisa Yusuf Wali (MBBS, M.Sc, Ph.D).

Professor, Department of Human Physiology, Bayero University Kano, Nigeria.

Visiting Professor, Northwest University, Kano

**Member**: Physiological Society of Nigeria 

**Role**: Teaching and Research 

**Teaching Focus**: Training Medical, Allied Health Sciences and core Physiology and Anatomy students.

**Research Focus**: Investigating Vit D among females in Northern Nigeria
